GOING_INTO - Static variable in class cip.render.util3d.Plane3fIntersection
The origin of the ray is outside of (a positive distance from) the plane, and the intersection is for the ray going into the plane.
GOING_INTO - Static variable in class cip.render.util3d.Quadric3fIntersection
The first intersection (at distance m_fDist1) is going into the quadric.
GOING_OUT_OF - Static variable in class cip.render.util3d.Plane3fIntersection
The origin of the ray is inside of (a negative distance from) the plane, and the intersection is for the ray going out of the plane.
GOING_OUT_OF - Static variable in class cip.render.util3d.Quadric3fIntersection
The first intersection (at distance m_fDist1) is going out of the quadric.
